title: Log Type
desc: Set the log type to collect

title: Log Size (KB)
desc: The max size of each log

title: Single Log
desc: Merge all logs before uploading to server

title: Decode log
desc: Decode logs into text files in /sdcard/mobileinsight/log/decoded/. May consume significant amount of power!

title: Log sharing
desc: Share the logs under the agreement of the privacy notice.

title: Upload the logs via WiFi
desc: Collected logs will only be uploaded when Wi-Fi is connected.
